content: --अक्षः, --आख्यः {1} a kind of goose with brown legs and bill; एतस्मिन्मदकल मल्लिकाक्षपक्षव्याधूतस्फुरदुरुदंडपुंडरीकाः (भुवो विभागाः) <ls>U. 1. 31</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 14.</ls> {2} a particular breed of horses (with white spots on the eyes). (--क्षी a female dog (with white spots on the eyes).
